name: Financial Privacy Rule (Reg P)
description: Governs the collection and disclosure of customers' personal financial information.

name: Safeguards Rule (Reg S-P)
description: Requires financial institutions to develop a secure information security program.

name: Pretexting Provisions
description: Prohibits obtaining customer information by false pretenses.

name: Breach Notification Rule (2024)
description: Requires notification to the FTC and consumers for breaches affecting 500+ people.
